name: Sweet Dreams & Flying Machines Swaddle
description:
Swaddles tightly to wrap your baby so he or she feels secure in a way that replicates the experience of being in the womb. It aids in settling and soothing infants, resulting in longer sleep with fewer awakenings. It is designed to be zipped on, therefore avoiding unraveling blankets that can be kicked off or end up over your babies head. The swaddles are designed for easy diaper changes and car seat rides, also open the snaps along the armholes and use it as a light sleeping bag. 
•Soft Bamboo Stretch French Terry
•Two-way zipper
•Baby can sleep swaddled with arms in or out
•Works easily with any car seat and easy for diaper changes
MADE IN CANADA

name: Sweet Dreams & Flying Machines Sleep Sack Light Weight
description:
•Beautifully soft 88% Nylon, 12% Spandex (Quick Dry & UV Protection) Shell.
•The closest layer to your baby is a super soft bamboo cotton jersey. (66% Rayon from Bamboo, 28% Cotton, 6% Spandex)
•Will stretch and move with your baby
•Perfect for rooms that are usually 21°-23° C.
•Two rows of shoulder snaps for the perfect fit. 
•Underarm snaps to shorten the armhole to avoid bunching around the face.
•Fully unzips to lay flat or just unzip halfway for easy diaper changes.
•9 month - 2.5 year has patent pending snaps that allow you to put your baby in it before bed allowing them to still easily walk.
•Available in 3-9 month, 9 month - 2.5 year sizes
•Machine washable
•Stringently designed and tested to conform to all Safety Standards
•Easily works with a five-point harness, for use in a stroller or car-seat 
MADE IN CANADA

name: Sweet Dreams & Flying Machines Sleep Sack Heavy Weight
description:
•Beautifully soft 88% Nylon, 12% Spandex (Quick Dry & UV Protection) Shell.
•The closest layer to your baby is a warm and cozy Micro Fleece. 
•Will stretch and move with your baby
•Perfect for rooms that are usually 16-20° C. 
•Two rows of shoulder snaps for the perfect fit. 
•Underarm snaps to shorted the armhole to avoid bunching around the face.
•Fully unzips to lay flat or just unzip halfway for easy diaper changes.
•9 month - 2.5 year has patent pending snaps that allow you to put your baby in it before bed allowing them to still easily walk.
•Available in 3-9 month, 9 month - 2.5 year sizes
•Machine washable
•Stringently designed and tested to conform to all Safety Standards
•Easily works with a five-point harness, for use in a stroller or car-seat
MADE IN CANADA

name: DVider Wall Decals ($38.00) (view more styles)
description: Make decorating easy with DVider wall decals.  Easy to install and remove.  Forget about buying paint and using your time to prep and paint the room when you can install wall decals in minutes.  Add colour and design to any room. You can apply them to any smooth surface.  Choose from various colours, sizes and images.

name: Flensted Mobiles ($40.00) (view more styles)
description:
Flensted mobiles are handmade, designer mobiles from Denmark.  With even the slightest air flow in the room these mobiles continue to move; no winding required.  They keep baby/toddler’s attention with the movement and bright colours.  These mobiles are a great gift to send to new parents; the light weight and minimum bulk makes shipping easy.  They are made of light weight plastic or cardboard .  Choose from various themes and decorate your little one’s room in style.

Made in Denmark

name: Connect Tusk Coat Racks (view more styles)
description:
Keep rooms tidy by hanging coats, towels, cloths, clothing, and accessories on these adorable, durable coat racks.   Tusk’s ears can be used to clip Bugalug barrettes to and hang headbands on.  Tusk is an original design made of powder coated steel and manufactured and designed in Calgary.  Add your own style by applying fun stickers to the surface.

Designed by Industrial Designer, John Greg Ball

Made in Canada

name: French Bull Plates and Cups (view more styles)
description: How fun while learning to eat with these French Bull, Super Hero Plates and Cups?  Your toddler will be excited to help set the table, without you worrying about plates being broken.  Durable, BPA free melamine, that is shatter proof and light weight.  They are also dishwasher safe.

name: Doidy Cup (view more colours)I
description:
Made in Scotland these cups are essential in teaching your little ones how to drink from a cup easily.  The slant allows kids to learn to drink from a cup easily as they do not have to thrust their heads downward and forward to see the liquid coming out
PVC, Bisphenol and Phthalate free
UNICEF baby friendly

Made in Scotland
For more colours visit: www.doidycup.ca

name: Bamboobino Hooded Wrap
description:
How cozy to wrap a newborn in a soft Bamboobino bamboo wrap? Bamboo’s porous fibres are fabulous for absorbing moisture from the skin.  Its soft cashmere feel makes everyone feel cozy.  Not only are they environmentally friendly, but they are cute and comfy.  These Hooded Wraps were chosen as one of Disney Family’s Top Product For New Mothers
Fits 0 - 6 months 

Made in Canada

name: Cover Play Slip Covers (view more styles)
description:
As seen on Sharks Tank, Cover Play slip covers are made with function and style in mind.  The fabrics and colours add style to any room and you can be comfortable placing your little ones in used play yards.  The slip cover provides a hygienic barrier that is soft and very easy to clean.  Keep your kids germ free and your play yard clean.  It comes with a matching tote and folds down to 9” x 3” x 9”; you can take the slip cover on trips without having to pack your whole play yard.   Great for home, the beach, day homes, hotels, and visiting friends.

Machine washable and dryable
Fits most standard play yards
Paediatrician recommended
- 95% cotton 5 % lycra

Mattress covers also available.

name: Kee- Ka Hooded Towel (view more styles)
description:
Kee - Ka uses low impact dyes that produce vibrant, unique colours that are not typically seen in baby products.  They are made of 100% certified organic cotton and are machine washable and dryable.  These towels will last your little on a long time with their large size 34” X 36”.  Pick the character to suit your little one.

Made in India

Green - Sweet Pea
Red - Love Bug
Pink with brown trim - Cupcake

name: Kee-Ka Organic Cotton Bib and Burp Cloth or Swaddle Blanket (view more styles)
description:
Bib and Burp Cloth Set: Kee - Ka uses certified organic cotton and low impact dyes to provide an environmentally friendly and safe bib and burp cloth for your baby.  Kee-Ka uses recycled cardboard in a ready to send box.  Great for baby shower gifts to send through the mail.  Made in Israel


Swaddle Blanket: If you want to keep your baby swaddled these blankets will do the trick.  The stretchy material and large size makes swaddling easy and keeps baby wrapped well.  They are made of 100% certified organic cotton and low impact dyes.  The colours are vibrant and not typically seen in baby products.  Pick the character to suit your little one or send to as a gift to a friend with the recycled packaging that is ready for mailing.  Made in  India
34” X 36”


Pick the character to suit your little one:

Cupcake (Bib and Burp Cloth or Swaddle Blanket)
Love Bug (Bib and Burp Cloth)
Sweet Pea (Bib and Burp Cloth or Swaddle Blanket)
Peanut (Swaddle Blanket)

Check out the matching hooded towels (Cupcake, Sweet Pea and Love Bug)

name: Kohlr Baby Organic Sleep Sacks Unlined
description:
These adorable sleep sacks are made with materials that are environmentally focused.  They are made of 55% hemp and 45% organic cotton.  No flame retardant finishes are used.  The hemp fabric is: pesticide-free, non-allergenic, has anti-bacterial properties, dries quickly, is recyclable, doesn’t wear out, gets softer and softer with each wash, and is one of  the strongest natural fibres.  These sacks have a side access zipper system to make diaper changes very easy.  The shoulder snaps make them easy for parents to put on and take off and the Sleepy Sheepy  Appliqué with satiny ‘Tag Legs’ helps to soothe little fingers.  

Made in Canada

1.0 TOG rating

Small - 2- 10 months (29”)
Medium - 10 - 24 months (34”)
Large - 24 - 36 months (39”)

name: Sleep Huggers Light Weight Sleep Sacks  Med
description:
Made in Canada these cute sleep sacks are comfy, made of 100% cotton, and follow medical professional criteria to help keep your little ones safe.  Some of the features include: large arm openings for good circulation, upside down zipper for easy changes, durable and long lasting design and extra long length for extended use.
Machine wash and dryer safe
Light weight sacks are 1.0 TOG - 20- 24 Celsius indoors

Medium - 6 - 18 months

Made in Canada

name: Sleep Huggers Heavy Weight Sleep Sacks Med
description:
Made in Canada these cute sleep sacks are comfy, made of 100% cotton, and follow medical professional criteria to help keep your little ones safe.  Some of the features include: large arm openings for good circulation, upside down zipper for easy changes, durable and long lasting design and extra long length for extended use.   The heavy weight sleep sacks have a natural fire retardant, hypo-allergenic polyester filling to keep baby warm without any added chemicals.
Machine wash and dryer safe

3.0 TOG - 15 - 20 Celsius indoors
Medium - 6 - 18 months

Made in Canada

name: Babylicious Sleep Sacks (view more styles)
description:
Babylicious sleep sacks have many features that make them handy for parents and comfy for little ones.  Their two way zipper is great for easy diaper changes.  The breathable material and no pill fleece on the inside keeps baby warm.  You can use the snaps on the bottom to make the sleep sack longer or shorter so that it can grow with baby. 

They also come in light weight material for summer.

name: Ollie Golightly Ring Slings (view more styles)
description:
Carry baby and look great too with these stylish Ring Slings from Ollie Golightly.  These slings are made of 100% linen fabric making them light weight and breathable.   They are hand screen printed and use low impact dyes.  Parent's hands are free while baby is comfy and secure.  There are many features that make these ring slings the top choice in baby carriers:
- Triple re - enforced weight bearing seams
- White stripe adjustment system allows you to know which part you are adjusting
- Cast aluminum rings
- Grosgrain trim
- Machine washable and dryable
- Long stylish tail provides extra fabric for privacy during nursing
- Unique design looks great on Mom or Dad
- Use from birth to early toddler

Made in Canada

name: Ollie Golightly Nursing Aprons (view more styles)
description:
From Toronto, Ollie Golightly products are a very stylish choice with their unique design to make mom and baby hip.  They are hand screen printed, use low impact dyes, and are made of linen. The 100% linen fabric is light weight and breathable.  This nursing cover has a rigid neck line which allows you to see baby and flannel corner cloths for easy clean up.
Machine washable and dryable

Made in Canada

name: Bamboobino Hooded Bath Apron with cloth (view more styles)
description:
Keep Mom and Dad dry while baby baths.  This Bath apron is made from bamboo and has a neck strap so that parents can wear as an apron.   Wrap baby up to dry off and then undo the neck strap when it is time to lay baby down to dry off and dress.  Bamboo’s porous fibres are fabulous for absorbing moisture from the skin after bathing.  Its soft cashmere feel ends bath time in a super soft way.
0-11months
70% Bamboo, 30% Organic Cotton
32”X32”
Trim - Pink, Blue or Brown
Includes bamboo cloth

Made in Canada

name: Bamboobino Beanie Hats and No Scratch Mitts
description:
Beanie Hat: Not only are Bamboobino's Beanie Hats environmentally friendly, but they are cute and comfy.  Bamboo's soft cashmere feel makes for a super cozy hat that keeps baby's head warm.    They are also great for sensitive skin.

0-6 months or 6- 12 months

No Scratch Mitts: Bamboobino's bamboo no-scratch mitts not only prevent scratches but their soft cashmere feel is also nice on babies sensitive skin.  No pesticides, dyes or tags, so that baby is comfy.     

Made in Canada

name: Bamboobino Bamboo Socks
description:
Bamboobino's stylish socks are comfortable for those tiny feet and bamboo’s porous fibers are fabulous for absorbing moisture from the skin.  

0-6 months
6-12 months
or 12 -24 months

name: Bamboobino Nursing Pads
description:
These super soft nursing pads are made of bamboo.  Bamboo’s porous fibres are fabulous for absorbing moisture from the skin.  Machine wash and dry. 2 pads per pack

Made in Canada

name: Bamboobino After Bath Hats
description:
Bamboos porous fibres and cashmere feel make this hat the perfect bath accessory.  The bamboo helps to absorb water and also keeps your little one's head warm.  You can also use the hat to keep baby's head warm while he or she plays in the water.  
(0-6 months or 6-12 months)
- 63% Bamboo, 27% Organic Cotton, 10% Polyester

name: Bamboobino Crib Sheet
description: Interlock knit sheets for baby's sensitive skin.  Made of bamboo.  These sheets have length and width indicators to make bad changes in the middle of the night easy.  132cm x 71 cm x 20 cm  (52" x 28" x 8")

name: Smart Mom Teething Bling (Patterned) (view more styles)
description:
Fancy for mom and fun for baby, now you can wear jewellery without having to worry about baby chewing on it.  Smart Mom necklaces are made from non-toxic silicone which provides baby with a fun teething toy and mom with stylish going out accessories.  Made from the highest quality phthalate- free silicone these necklaces are non toxic, latex free, food-safe and dishwasher safe.  These necklaces are for adult wear only and are meant to entertain and sooth babies with emerging teeth.  They have a breakaway clasp for an additional safety feature.  Smart Mom donates to curesearch.org and dressforsuccess.org

Note: children with fully developed teeth may be able to bite through the Teething Bling

name: Little Carr Cover Me Straps (view more styles)
description:
Little Carr Cover Me Straps were chosen as one of Disney Family’s Top 21 Diaper Bag Essentials.  Use these stylish straps during nursing with your receiving blanket, as a bib strap, to hold blankets onto the stroller or to attach blankets as a sun block.  There are clips on both ends and the length of the strap adjusts.  Conveniently fits in diaper bag or purse

Check out our new Styles

name: Babylicious Yummy Blankets (view more styles)
description: These blankets are a great size 30” X 40” so they will last a long time.  With the no pill fleece on one side and 100% cotton on the other side they are nice and warm for baby but not too puffy.  They also work well for a comfy playmat that folds up nicely.

11” X 16”

There are no use of dyes or harmful chemical.   They are easy to grip and can be used wet or dry.  Made in Canada these natural teethers are a perfect choice for soothing baby's irritated gums.
